Reviews.Title: Blue Christmas
Reviews.Author: Podatide
Reviews.Content: I got this camera two weeks ago (an early Christmas present for myself).  Last week I took it to Disneyland for its first big test, and I'm happy to report that it passed with flying colors.  The camera feels really good in my hand(s), solid, and ready.  It powers up quickly so I didn't miss a shot.  And the pictures were terrific in bright sunlight and in low light situations as well.  And when the sun went down and the Christmas lights came on, I was able to get some nice shots, handheld.  Image stabilization and auto-focus worked like a charm.  This is my first experience with a DSLR so I can't make comparisons (but a friend's new Canon was having difficulty focusing in low light); I can only say that this little camera is great!  And the price is hard to beat.  And the color?  Nothing else like it.  If blue isn't your thing, try green, orange, pink, etc.

Reviews.Title: Pentax is often overlooked
Reviews.Author: James R Chadek
Reviews.Content: First know it uses AA batteries. You are never far from more. The 8x Energizers have lasted more than 800 pics so far.Easy lens swapping from earlier K mounts gives you a great base.Great for point and shoot or technical set your self work.Way more camera for the money than the department store Canon or Nikon.A 5 star all the way around. The second one I have gifted.
